nl.tno.sensorstorm.particlemapper

Class ParticleMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.sensorstorm.particlemapper.ParticleMapper

  • public class ParticleMapper
extends Object
    Utility Class that can map Tuples to Particles and Particles to Values. The class also has useful related methods.

    • Method Detail

      • particleToValues

        public static backtype.storm.tuple.Values particleToValues(Particle particle)
        Map a Particle to a Values object.
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to map
        Returns:
        Corresponding Values object

      • particleToValues

        public static backtype.storm.tuple.Values particleToValues(Particle particle,
                                           int expectedNrOfFields)
        Map a Particle to a Values object and make sure it has expectedNrOfFields fields. This is useful for when a Spout or Bolt has declared more output fields than this Particle has.
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to map
        expectedNrOfFields - Desired number of fields
        Returns:
        Corresponding Values object

      • tupleToParticle

        public static <T extends Particle> T tupleToParticle(backtype.storm.tuple.Tuple tuple,
                                     Class<T> clazz)
        Map a Tuple to a Particle when the type of the Particle is already known.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Particle
        Parameters:
        tuple - Tuple to be mapped
        clazz - Class of the expected type of Particle
        Returns:
        The mapped Tuple

      • tupleToParticle

        public static Particle tupleToParticle(backtype.storm.tuple.Tuple tuple)
        Map a Tuple to a Particle when the type of the Particle is not yet known.
        Parameters:
        tuple - Tuple to be mapped
        Returns:
        The mapped Tuple

      • getFields

        public static backtype.storm.tuple.Fields getFields(Class<? extends Particle> clazz)
        Get the Fields present in type of Particle.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class of the Particle
        Returns:
        Fields in the Particle

      • inspectClass

        public static void inspectClass(Class<? extends Particle> clazz)
        Inspect a type of Particle. A Particle cannot be mapped until it is known by the ParticleMapper. No worries, the SensorStormSpout and SensorStormBolt usually take care of this.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Type of the Particle to inspect

      • mergeFields

        public static backtype.storm.tuple.Fields mergeFields(backtype.storm.tuple.Fields first,
                                      backtype.storm.tuple.Fields second)
        Merge two Fields objects. Duplicate fields are removed in the process. If one of the arguments is null the method will return a copy of the other Fields. If both are null the result is an empty Fields object.
        Parameters:
        first - The first Fields object (may be null)
        second - The second Fields object (may be null)
        Returns:
        Fields object

      • getFieldIdx

        public static int getFieldIdx(Class<? extends Particle> clazz,
              String fieldId)
        Get the index of a Field in the Tuple of a Particle.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Type of Particle.
        fieldId - Name of the field
        Returns:
        position of the field. -1 if not found.
